module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.galleryoverview
module.import-script:
# sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/' 'NavImage' 'tools/galleryoverview/icons/big/gal_manage.png:tools/galleryoverview/icons/small/gal_manage.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/' 'NavPos' '60.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/' 'Title' 'Gallery Overview' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.CmsDefaultToolHandler'
writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/downloadgallery/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_DOWNLOAD_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/downloadgallery/' 'NavImage' 'tools/galleryoverview/icons/big/gal_download.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/downloadgallery/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_DOWNLOAD_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/downloadgallery/' 'NavPos' '1.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/downloadgallery/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_DOWNLOAD_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/downloadgallery/' 'Title' 'Download Gallery' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/downloadgallery/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.galleryoverview.CmsGalleriesToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/downloadgallery/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/downloadgallery/' 'internal' '4'
writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/htmlgallery/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_HTML_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/htmlgallery/' 'NavImage' 'tools/galleryoverview/icons/big/gal_html.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/htmlgallery/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_HTML_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/htmlgallery/' 'NavPos' '2.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/htmlgallery/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_HTML_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/htmlgallery/' 'Title' 'Html Gallery' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/htmlgallery/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.galleryoverview.CmsGalleriesToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/htmlgallery/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/htmlgallery/' 'internal' '4'
writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/imagegallery/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_IMAGE_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/imagegallery/' 'NavImage' 'tools/galleryoverview/icons/big/gal_image.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/imagegallery/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_IMAGE_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/imagegallery/' 'NavPos' '3.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/imagegallery/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_IMAGE_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/imagegallery/' 'Title' 'Image Gallery' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/imagegallery/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.galleryoverview.CmsGalleriesToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/imagegallery/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/imagegallery/' 'internal' '4'
writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/linkgallery/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_LINK_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/linkgallery/' 'NavImage' 'tools/galleryoverview/icons/big/gal_link.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/linkgallery/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_LINK_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/linkgallery/' 'NavPos' '4.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/linkgallery/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_LINK_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/linkgallery/' 'Title' 'Link Gallery' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/linkgallery/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.galleryoverview.CmsGalleriesToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/linkgallery/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/linkgallery/' 'internal' '4'
writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/tablegallery/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_TABLE_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/tablegallery/' 'NavImage' 'tools/galleryoverview/icons/big/gal_table.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/tablegallery/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_TABLE_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/tablegallery/' 'NavPos' '5.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/tablegallery/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_TABLE_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/tablegallery/' 'Title' 'Content Check' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/tablegallery/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.galleryoverview.CmsGalleriesToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/tablegallery/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/tablegallery/' 'internal' '5'
module.description:
This module contains Overviews for every OpenCms gallery types.
